<<<<<<< HEAD
A wonder and yet no wonder a great red dragon in heaven. Hyde, Edward, 1607-1659.
[12], 54 p.
Printed by J. Macock, for Giles Calvert, at the black spread Eagle at the west end of Pauls, London : 1651 [i.e. 1650]
Epistle to the reader signed: Edw. Hide Junior. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb 21 1650"; imprint date crossed through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
